answers.answer: Hello,Depending on the severity of fungal infection, it may take some days to weeks for the fungal infection to clear up. Various reasons for recurrent or persistent fungal infection are incomplete treatment, treatment resistance, co-existing dermatitis, diabetes and low immunity. So use the prescribed medicines as per your doctor’s prescription and if the fungal infection persists then you may need to use topical antifungals or oral antifungals for some more time.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.
